headline: How the Narrative Surrounding Ross Stores Is Shifting After Strong Q3 and Higher Targets
summary: Ross Stores is stepping into the spotlight again as analysts nudge their fair value targets higher, with estimates now around $183 versus roughly $178 previously. This modest upward shift, driven by a slightly stronger growth outlook and a higher discount rate near 8.6% versus about 8.4%, mirrors a Street narrative that is becoming more constructive even as macro risks linger. Stay tuned to see how you can track these evolving targets and stay ahead of the shifting narrative around Ross...
